name: EnerJelly
description:
Snatch up all of your matching colored fish to feed your hungry Jellyfish.

Controls:

Jellyfish 1

  • Q - Raise tentacle 1
  • A - Lower tentacle 1
  • E - Raise tentacle 2
  • D - Lower tentacle 2

Jellyfish 2

  • U - Raise tentacle 1
  • J - Lower tentacle 1
  • O - Raise tentacle 2
  • L - Lower tentacle 2

Pixel FJVerdana font by flashjunior

Bubble button graphic by HorrorPen
